ygData.subject: RE: Basic questions
ygData.msgSnippet: actually, give it one dagger and it holds 2 daggers, and attacks just as fast and often as with 2 =) i usually save fine steel daggers i find and give em to my
ygData.messageBody:
actually, give it one dagger and it holds 2 daggers, and attacks just as
fast and often as with 2 =)

i usually save fine steel daggers i find and give em to my pet. makes em
bad ass.

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, lazy 35th lvl enchanter on
Cazic-Thule

At 08:35 AM 10/6/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Farr, Robert" <Robert.Farr@...>
>
>It turns into a sword and dagger when you give it a dagger. When you get to
>level 29 and are able to give it 2 daggers, it turns into 2 daggers with no
>shield. Looks pretty darned cool!
